evolution_stages.conversation_summary: 1) Problems discussed: Freezing when called on in class, inability to join social conversations, panic in group settings. 2) Solutions offered/accepted: Pause phrase practice, targeted 1:1 interactions, scenario rehearsals including awkward outcomes. 3) Student's response: Willing to try pre-class approach, enthusiastic about roommate practice, reframed attempts as skill-building. 4) Evidence of progress: Concrete plan for Contracts class interaction, anxiety reduction from 8 to 7.5, adoption of 'practice mindset'.

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Discussed: 1) Freezing during cold calls, 2) Difficulty joining peer conversations, 3) Study group panic. Solutions: 1) Pause technique practice, 2) Targeted one-person interaction, 3) Awkward scenario rehearsal. Response: Accepted all solutions, planned concrete attempts. Progress: Reframed past failure as brave attempt, scheduled specific practice, committed to tomorrow's social attempt with safety nets.

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Problems discussed: 1) Difficulty speaking when called on in class, 2) Struggles with making friends and joining conversations. Solutions offered/accepted: 1) Practice with roommate and use pause phrase, 2) Approach one person with observational comment and prepare exit line. Student's response to solutions: Positive, willing to try both strategies, plans to approach a specific classmate. Evidence of progress/improvement: Recognizes small steps as progress, reframed perspective on awkward moments, plans concrete actions for next day.
